trivia.question: Which NBA player is the current all time leader in points scored?
Who has the most dunks in NBA history?
trivia.fact: Since the statistic was officially tracked in 1996, the player with the most NBA Regular season Dunks is Dwight Howard. At the end of the 2023 season he had made 2,950 dunks, leading second placed and retired Shaquille O’neal (2,626) by 324. Dwight Howard (3,252) leads Shaq (3,200) by just 52 dunks when Playoffs and Regular season are combined.

trivia.question: Which NBA player is the all time leader in blocks?
trivia.fact: Kareem Abdul-Jabbar holds the record for the most NBA MVP awards, having won the award 6 times in his career. He won his first MVP award in the 1970-71 season and his last one in the 1979-80 season. No other player in NBA history has won as many MVP awards as Abdul-Jabbar.

trivia.question: Which NBA player had the most 40 point games for their career?
trivia.fact: Jordan is the greatest scorer, mid-range shooter, and overall player in NBA history. With his 173 40-point games, Jordan also added 31 50-point games and four 60-point games. His best single-game performance would come in a 1990 contest against the Cleveland Cavaliers. On this night, Jordan scored 69 points in a 117-113 overtime win. He shot 62.2% from the field, going 23-37 overall and 21-23 from the foul line.
